PLAY.TITLE: The Tragedy of Othello, the Moor of Venice

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: OTHELLO, a noble Moor in the service of the Venetian state.
MONTANO, Othello's predecessor in the government of Cyprus.
DESDEMONA, daughter to Brabantio and wife to Othello.
Sailor, Messenger, Herald, Officers, Gentlemen, Musicians, and Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Venice: a Sea-port in Cyprus.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Venice. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: BRABANTIO appears above, at a window
Enter, below, BRABANTIO, and Servants with torches

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Another street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter OTHELLO, IAGO, and Attendants with torches
Enter CASSIO, and certain Officers with torches

Enter BRABANTIO, RODERIGO, and Officers with
torches and weapons

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A council-chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
The DUKE and Senators sitting at a table; Officers
attending
Enter BRABANTIO, OTHELLO, IAGO, RODERIGO, and Officers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A Sea-port in Cyprus. An open place near the quay.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: A cry within 'A sail, a sail, a sail!'

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CASSIO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter DESDEMONA, EMILIA, IAGO, RODERIGO, and
Attendants

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Within 'A sail, a sail!' Guns heard

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter a Herald with a proclamation; People
following

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A hall in the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter OTHELLO, DESDEMONA, CASSIO, and Attendants

Re-enter CASSIO; with him MONTANO and Gentlemen;
servants following with wine

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OTHELLO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: To MONTANO, who is led off

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all but IAGO and CASSIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in the castle.
SCENE III. The garden of the castle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OTHELLO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: He puts the handkerchief from him; and it drops

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Cyprus. Before the castle.
SCENE II. A room in the castle.
SCENE III. Another room In the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter OTHELLO, LODOVICO, DESDEMONA, EMILIA and
Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Cyprus. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: IAGO from behind wounds CASSIO in the leg, and exit

SPEECH.SPEAKER: IAGO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: CASSIO and RODERIGO are borne off

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A bedchamber in the castle: DESDEMONA in bed asleep; a light burning.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MONTANO, GRATIANO, IAGO, and others
He runs at IAGO IAGO, from behind, stabs EMILIA, and exit

Enter LODOVICO. MONTANO, CASSIO carried in a chair,
and Officers with IAGO, prisoner
Falls on the bed, and dies
